item.title: Looking for an American Myth
item.description:
One reflection of the political and social crisis in the country is the on-going battle of over myths of national origin and purpose. We can see this taking place now in the furious reaction to ‚ÄúCritical Race Theory,‚Äù now resulting in book banning and censorship. We can also see it in the intense anger and controversy generated by the 1619 Project, whic‚Ä¶

How to misinterpret clinical outcome data in populations by age subgroups
item.description:
Recently a headline in the New York Times was ‚ÄúYounger People Benefit Less From Boosters Than Older‚Äù. Of course they do, as risk of nearly any intervention in medicine along with its absolute benefit are less with younger age. But to imply that boosters don‚Äôt help younger people is a flawed interpretation‚Ä¶
